bug.author: noklam
bug.summary: cp950 codec decode error on Window machine
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
streamlit hello runs into decode error 'cp950' codec can't decode byte 0xf0 in position 1080: illegal multibyte sequence 'cp950' codec can't decode byte 0xf0 in position 1080: illegal multibyte sequence <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug: Window 10 conda create -n streamlit conda install python==3.6.1 pip install streamlit streamlit hello <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18221871/66577738-761c9e00-ebac-11e9-930b-ae304774d3f4.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Cannot reproduce in python 3.6 on Windows 10 using streamlit 0.58.0. This bug is old enough that if the behavior shows up again, we should open a new bug.
